characters.name: Aki Adagaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 162 cm

Aki comes from a well off family and is known for her brutal treatment of men. As a result, she has gained the nickname "Cruel Princess" from her classmates. She allegedly rejected Masamune-kun and gave him the nickname "Piggy" when the two were children leading to his transformation and commitment to revenge. 

~!It was later revealed though that her hatred towards men is because her childhood crush Masamune left without saying anything which left her heartbroken. When Masamune finally confronts her about the past she tells him that she never gave him the nickname "piggy" in the first place, and never heard of that nickname before. As Aki learns Masamune's identity and situation, she attempts to make him the same chubby boy he used to be. Aki mentions that she found his chubbiness "cute" and overall as a symbol of wealth implying that chubby guys are her type.!~

characters.name: Masamune Makabe
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm

A narcissistic boy who is obsessed with the idea of getting revenge. His feelings of revenge are aimed towards the popular rich girl, Adagaki Aki. Despite his handsome appearance now, he was once a chubby kid who people liked to make fun of. 

~!It is shown later on that the reason he hates Adagaki Aki so much was because she rejected his feelings for her and nicknamed him "Piggy". Later on, in order to get revenge on Aki, Makabe teams up with Koiwai Yoshino, Aki's maid.!~

characters.name: Chinatsu Hayase
characters.description: She is the younger sister of Masamune Makabe and currently attends middle school as a second year. She does not possess the same surname as her brother due to Masamune's choice of changing from Hayase to Makabe.

characters.name: Tae Futaba
characters.description:
Masamune's class rep. She loves Yaoi and likes pairing Masamune to Kojuurou.

~!She confessed her feelings to Masamune once, but got rejected.!~

characters.name: Yoshino Koiwai
characters.description:
Yoshino is Aki's maid and follower. She seems to be a clumsy girl. However, beneath her clumsy and shy appearance she is actually extremely deceptive and cold, able to deceive and hurt Aki without a second thought. Unlike Aki, Yoshino easily gained weight from sweets.

~!Later it was revealed that Yoshino had disguised herself as Aki eight years before, rejected Masamune, and gave him the nickname "Piggy" due to jealously towards Aki's affection to him, but soon realized that her actions caused Aki to become estrange towards men. She has been regretting this and attempted to repay what she has done after Aki and Masamune reunited in high school.!~

~!She later falls in love with Makabe Masamune.!~

characters.name: Sonoka Kaneko
characters.description:
Kaneko Sonoka is one of the girls who have self-proclaimed themselves as [Aki Adagaki](https://anilist.co/character/76364/)'s bodyguards and the Vice President of Yasaka High School Student Council.

Kaneko is a cute and fairly short girl. She has dirty-blonde hair that has two pink ribbons tying up two straps of her hair into ring-shaped like while the rest of her hair reaches her chest and pink eyes. She wears the Yasaka High School uniform which consists of a pink shirt, black vest with the school symbol on it, a striped yellow skirt and a blue and yellow ribbon.

characters.name: Kojuurou Shuri
characters.description:
**Height:** 155 cm

Masamune's best friend who looks like a girl, but is actually a boy. ~!He has a small crush on Neko.!~

characters.name: Neko Fujinomiya
characters.description:
**Height:** 159 cm

Neko Fujinomiya is a cute and cheerful rich girl who transferred school after Makabe "gave her his coat on Christmas Eve" and fell in love with him. She has a frail body, needing to consume many drugs although she often makes jokes about it. Due to her habit of not wearing any panties, Aki and Yoshino nicknamed her "Pantie-less Woman".

~!While claiming that she just needs Masamune to pretend that their first encounter were real, Neko is actually genuinely in love with Masamune when he's still chubby, although it is never revealed how. After Masamune rejected her, Neko's condition got worse and she underwent a surgery abroad, and then came back with better health and thus continue to support Masamune.!~

characters.name: Kinue Hayase
characters.description:
__Height:__ 138 cm
__Occupation:__ Housewife

She has light brown hair that curls at the tips and brown eyes. She wears a headband that has a dog footprint on and she usually is seen wearing an apron. She is very short, has a small body, and can be easily mistaken for a child, even though she is 42 years old. She is also the mother of Makabe Masamune.

characters.name: Muriel Besson
alt_names: ミュリ・エルベッソン
characters.description:
Muriel Besson is a young French student with a keen interest in the Japanese culture. Her brother, Frank Besson, is the boss of a Milieu, who spoils her very much.

During Masamune's trip to France, she uses him as her model of her hero, and Aki as the heroine.  

Muriel has medium length blonde hair that is usually tied up, and blue eyes. Her right eye is usually covered with a black eye patch, with a white rose symbol on the patch. She has a black tattoo on the upper left side of her back.

characters.name: Kanetsugu Gasou
characters.description: __Gender:__ ~!Female!~ ~!Kanetsugu Gasou is a daughter of a family which used to be rich. She was one of Aki's love interests. Kanetsugu pretends to be Aki's childhood "Masamune" to gain funding for her little sister and home.!~

characters.name: Yuisaki Midori
characters.description: Midori Yuisaki is one of Aki Adagaki's maids.
